title: Additional Rune Pages
body: How do you purchase additional rune pages currently? I've searched multiple times through the store and am unable to find them. Can anyone assist?

replies.body:
Head into the **Gameplay** tab in the shop, then ensure the sorting on the left side all says **Show All**. Below is a screenshot to visually assist you:

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped!
